meanings.definition: In a strict or rigid manner
meanings.sent1: She followed the rules straitlacedly, never deviating from the instructions.
meanings.sent2: He walked straitlacedly, with his back straight and his eyes focused ahead.
meanings.sent3: The robot moved straitlacedly, following its programming to the letter.
meanings.sent4: The soldier stood straitlacedly at attention, ready for any command.
meanings.sent5: The teacher spoke straitlacedly, expecting complete silence from the students.

meanings.definition: Conforming to conventional or moral standards
meanings.sent1: Her straitlacedly appearance made her stand out in the crowd of rebellious teenagers.
meanings.sent2: The town's straitlacedly values were evident in their strict dress code.
meanings.sent3: The cat looked at the dog straitlacedly, as if judging its behavior.
meanings.sent4: The old house stood straitlacedly among the modern buildings, a relic of the past.
meanings.sent5: His straitlacedly behavior earned him the reputation of being a model citizen.
